text: Looking West From Bear Mountain Bear Mountain is a peak in the Tehachapi Mountains, near Tehachapi, California. The mountain is north of Bear Valley Springs, and west of the Tehachapi Loop, a spiral on the railroad line through Tehachapi Pass. Much of the mountain is on land owned by the Keene Ranch. == References == == External links == * Category:Mountains of Kern County, California Category:Tehachapi Mountains Category:Mountains of Southern California
title: Bear Mountain (Kern County, California)
